original_title: Comment je suis devenue une putain
overview: Dreams of sodomy, exhibition in the subway, interracial and midnight gang bangs on a construction site, threesomes in a lingerie store, a quickie in the restroom on a boat on the Seine river before an orgy in a bourgeois apartment, one must wonder what goes on in Claire Castel's head for sex to be such an obsession.  Going through all these experiences, Claire Castel slowly becomes a true expert in sexuality. Her deep throats get more and more....deep, with the most intense double-penetrations and she cums under showers of sperm.  As if on a long apprenticeship toward becoming the the best whore in Paris.
title: How I Became a Whore
